item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/misc-movies/my-favorite-things-two/
************************************************ Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Taylor Swift - Christmas Tree Farm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords Used: Am, Bdim7, C, Fmaj7, G, D7, F, Em, Dm
As performed by Taylor Swift
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/1XBQCLV-hUI
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at:https://ukutabs.com/t/taylor-swift/christmas-tree-farm/

item.title: David Bisbal - Mucho más allá
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords Used: G, D, Bm, Dm, C, F, Dm7, A, D, E, C#m, Cm, Bb
As performed by PANIC! AT THE DISCO, as featured in Disney's FROZEN II
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/YEm7Bj0L1eM
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/p/panic-at-the-disco/into-the-unknown/ **************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com

item.title: Grace VanderWaal - I Don't Like You
item.description:
For educational use. Created with Lyrics and Chord Letter Names so any non-transposing instrument can play along. Key of Dm.
Chords Used: Dm, Bb, C, Am, A
As performed by Grace VanderWaal
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/un3nh0nx_sc
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at ukutabs.com: https://ukutabs.com/g/grace-vanderwaal/i-dont-like-you-two/ **************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: Billie Eilish - come out and play
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Come Out And Play - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am C Cmaj7 Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums or D DU D DU (slow)
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Santa Claus is Coming To Town (Ukulele Play Along) Accompaniment Santa Claus is Coming to Town
item.description: For educational use. This is a ukulele play along for my students for our upcoming concert. Chords: C, C7, F, Fm, Am, G7, Dm, D7, and G.

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.

item.title: Train - Calling All Angels
item.description:
Calling All Angles by Train. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele players can play along. Chords used: G, C, F, Am, and Dm. The lyric video was created and posted by YouTuber Earthquaker, I simply added the chords. For educational use.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: R.E.M. - Losing My Religion
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Losing My Religion - R.E.M.
Using the chords: Am C D Dm Em F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Elton John - Rocket Man
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Rocket Man - Elton John Written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin
Using the chords: Am7 C D Dm F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
